Project 1: Digital Fulfilment services | Team Size: 5 
Client: Assurant solution, Atlanta, GA (USA) 
Duration: Feb 2022 to till date 
Role: Project Lead 
Description: 
Assurant, Inc. is a global provider of risk management products and services with headquarters in New York City. Its businesses 
provide a diverse set of specialty, niche-market insurance products in the property, casualty, extended device protection, and 
preneed insurance sectors. Digital Fulfilment Services is a corporation that includes global lifestyle businesses for the project. 
We are offering the end user various Notification services in accordance with Payment, policy and insurance functions, such as 
emails, letters, SMS, and notes (blackNight system) 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Assisting with continuing audit preparedness; monitoring App Insight DataDog Alerts and system health.

emails, letters, SMS, and notes (blackNight system) 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Assisting with continuing audit preparedness; monitoring App Insight DataDog Alerts and system health. 
• reviewing and following up daily about production issues that occur  
• Preparing and maintaining procedure documentation 
• Support for UAT call logging and production 
• Notifies business and technical partners as soon as incidents arise that affect the availability or performance of the system. 
• Periodically review and update the DR scripts to keep them updated 
• Keep DR information (Recovery Time Objective, Recover to Objective, etc) 
• Establishing cross-training initiatives within the team to provide enhanced support capability 
• Analysing and resolving production issues while documenting and following up on all issues 
• Identify and remove impediments, prevent distractions 
• Leading the development and production support team and handling major incident.

• Identify and remove impediments, prevent distractions 
• Leading the development and production support team and handling major incident. 
• Worked  and developed  as per  requirement  and  deployed  the  changes  using  CI/CD  pipelines  and  doing  production 
validation. 
 
Environment: C#.Net, dot Net Core, AZURE function app, app services, SQL server, WCF services, Web API 
 
Project 2: Data engineering Global Lifestyle | Team Size: 18 
Client: Assurant solution, Atlanta, GA (USA) 
Duration: July 2019 to Feb 2022 
Role: Project Lead 
Description: 
Data  engineering  is  entity  which  include  Global  lifestyle  business,  Global  life  style  having  different  types  of  entities  like Call 
centre, Data analyst, claim management, Machine learning and forecasting etc. 
All application’s development and support activity done in new technologies like Azure, Dot net core, SSIS, WCF etc. 
 
Responsibilities:

All application’s development and support activity done in new technologies like Azure, Dot net core, SSIS, WCF etc. 
 
Responsibilities: 
• Assists with optimization and performance of bigdata ecosystems. Assists with research and building of proof of concepts 
to test out theories recommended by Senior and Lead Data Engineers  
• Create Generic data factory pipeline which are mainly use to migration of data from in premises to azure database.  
• Schedule Data UC4 jobs to generate different reports and forecast data as per requirement. 
• Construct,  test  and  maintain  scalable  data  solutions  for  structured  and  unstructured  data  to  support  their  reporting, 
analytics, ML and AI solutions 
• Development of code as per the business requirements and provide best solution which we can gives better scalability and 
performance. 
• Contribute to the design, development of data-pipelines and feature engineering of data solutions

performance. 
• Contribute to the design, development of data-pipelines and feature engineering of data solutions 
• Collaborates and contributes in identifying project risks, design mitigation plans, develops estimates.

• Unit testing and system integration testing of the developed code 
• Providing fixes to the issues identified in testing phase. 
• Created design document and application understanding document 
• Maintain Query log which is helpful to track the requirement. 
• Received client appreciations for the projects he worked on. 
 
 
Environment: C#.Net, .NET core, AZURE Databricks, Data Factory, SQL server, SSIS,UC4 Automic, WCF services, WCF
